package.name: motoman_motopos_mh1655_support

description.p: ROS Industrial support for the Motoman MotoPos mh1655 positioners (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman MotoPos mh1655 positioner.
Specifications can be found online at https://www.motoman.com/en-us/products/peripherals/positioners/headstock-tailstock.

Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular positioner model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Alec Tiefenthal
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
